title: One Bert Show Member Is Stressing Over Their Parents' Upcoming Trip
description:
Our producer Romeo has always felt the pressure to be perfect for his parents. Not only that but he's always assisted his parents with any thing they do because they're immigrants. 
Because of this, they've never gone on a trip without him. But that's all about to change this weekend, and he's super nervous about it.
